name: The Castle of Death
description:
You wake up on the floor of a study next to a dead body.  All the evidence points to you.   Can you figure out why you did it?  Or better yet, figure out if someone else did before the police arrive?

This game requires you to become a detective and solve a mystery, while staying out of the clutches of the law until you're ready!   Some of the clues will be easy to find, some of them less so. Your handy notebook will be your best friend as you solve the murder in The Castle of Death!

If you get lost, there's HELP in-game :) 

Enjoy!

@DarkBlueMonkey
